atk-s0507a0:12_0: Petehi ca kataṁ kammaṁ, yaṁ yaṁ purimajātisu;
atk-s0507a0:23_0: Sakkaccaṁ bhāsato taṁ me, nisāmayatha sādhavoti.
atk-s0507a0:24_0: Tattha petavatthūti seṭṭhiputtādikassa tassa tassa sattassa petabhāvahetubhūtaṁ kammaṁ,
atk-s0507a0:24_1: tassa pana pakāsanavasena pavatto “khettūpamā arahanto”tiādikā pariyattidhammo idha “petavatthū”ti adhippeto.
atk-s0507a0:25_8: itaraṁ nāradattherādīhi pucchitaṁ tehi tehi petehi bhāsitaṁ.
atk-s0507a0:25_9: Satthā pana yasmā nāradattherādīhi tasmiṁ tasmiṁ pucchāvissajjane ārocite taṁ taṁ aṭṭhuppattiṁ katvā sampattaparisāya dhammaṁ desesi,
atk-s0507a0:25_10: tasmā sabbampetaṁ petavatthu satthārā bhāsitameva nāma jātaṁ.
atk-s0507a0:25_11: Pavattitavaradhammacakke hi satthari tattha tattha rājagahādīsu viharante yebhuyyena tāya tāya aṭṭhuppattiyā
atk-s0507a0:25_12: pucchāvissajjanavasena sattānaṁ kammaphalapaccakkhakaraṇāya taṁ taṁ petavatthu desanāruḷhanti ayaṁ tāvettha
atk-s0507a0:25_14: Asādhāraṇato pana tassa tassa vatthussa atthavaṇṇanāyameva āgamissati.
atk-s0507a0:26_0: Taṁ panetaṁ petavatthu vinayapiṭakaṁ suttantapiṭakaṁ abhidhammapiṭakanti tīsu piṭakesu suttantapiṭakapariyāpannaṁ,
atk-s0507a0:26_1: dīghanikāyo majjhimanikāyo saṁyuttanikāyo aṅguttaranikāyo khuddakanikāyoti pañcasu nikāyesu khuddakanikāyapariyāpannaṁ,
atk-s0507a0:26_2: suttaṁ geyyaṁ veyyākaraṇaṁ gāthā udānaṁ itivuttakaṁ jātakaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ vedallanti navasu sāsanaṅgesu gāthāsaṅgahaṁ.
atk-s0507a0:28_0: Caturāsīti sahassāni, ye me dhammā pavattino”ti. –
atk-s0507a0:29_0: Evaṁ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena paṭiññātesu caturāsītiyā dhammakkhandhasahassesu katipayadhammakkhandhasaṅgahaṁ,
